invocations.description: Adds a waypoint of type wpttype at position x: posx, y: posy, z: posz. Possible values for wpttype are 'Walk', 'Node', 'Stand', 'Shovel', 'Rope', 'Machete', 'Ladder', 'User', 'Action' and 'Lure'.
invocations.ex:
init start
	local lastPos = {$posx, $posy}
	local stepCount = 0
init end

auto(100)
if lastPos[1] ~= $posx or lastPos[2] ~= $posy then
	lastPos = {$posx, $posy}
	stepCount = stepCount + 1

	if stepCount == 10 then
		addwaypoint('Node', $posx, $posy, $posz)
		stepCount = 0
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: Will add a 'Node' waypoint on your current location for every 10 steps you take.
